title: Cisco Umbrella DNS - Proxied Traffic
description: This dashboard offers a comprehensive view of web traffic with a focus on proxy-related activities. Total Proxied Traffic, Blocked, and Allowed metrics provide an instant overview of web activity. Users can track Proxied Traffic Overtime, offering insights into trends and patterns. Top Internal IPs, External IPs, Categories, and Web Content Types help identify key elements in web traffic. With details on request distribution, bytes sent and received, and top identities, this dashboard provides a detailed and dynamic perspective on proxy traffic for enhanced security monitoring and analysis.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard offers a comprehensive view of web traffic with a focus on proxy-related activities. Total Proxied Traffic, Blocked, and Allowed metrics provide an instant overview of web activity. Users can track Proxied Traffic Overtime, offering insights into trends and patterns. Top Internal IPs, External IPs, Categories, and Web Content Types help identify key elements in web traffic. With details on request distribution, bytes sent and received, and top identities, this dashboard provides a detailed and dynamic perspective on proxy traffic for enhanced security monitoring and analysis.

## Widgets

1. Total Proxied Traffic
2. Total Blocked Proxied Traffic
3. Total Allowed Proxied Traffic
4. Proxied Traffic Overtime
5. Top Internal IPs
6. Top External IPs
7. Top Categories
8. Top Web Content Types
9. Traffic Requests by Client IP
10. Distribution by Destination IP
11. Top Blocked Categories
12. Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories
13. Top Accessed URLs
14. Top Denied URLs
15. Top Referer URLs
16. Proxied DNS Responses
17. Request Distribution by Method
18. Request Distribution by Isolate State
19. Request Distribution by Warn Status
20. Bytes Sent Overtime
21. Bytes Received Overtime
22. Request Distribution by Client Browser
23. Request Distribution by Client OS
24. Top Identities
25. Top Identity Types
26. Log Details

definition.title: Traffic Distribution by Verdict and Categories
